mapper.select: SELECT id, name, team_id as teamId, creator, create_time as createTime, state, email_group as emailGroup FROM application where id = #{value}
SELECT id, name, team_id as teamId, creator, create_time as createTime, state, email_group as emailGroup FROM application where id = #{applicationCode}

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.team_id as teamId, t.name as teamName, a.creator, a.create_time as createTime, a.state, aa.name as stateName, a.email_group as emailGroup FROM application a join team_dict t on a.team_id = t.id join application_apply_state_dict aa on aa.id = a.state
mapper.insert: insert into application( name, team_id, creator, create_time, state, email_group ) values ( #{name}, #{teamId}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{emailGroup} )
mapper.update: update application set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
